author: ianna
body:
- Remaining XML data files from external data package are now back in CMSSW (as discussed with Giulio)
- Upgrade scenarios up-to-date
- New FastSim scenario for PhaseI (note it's in PhaseI/Forward) 
- Geometry/CaloEventSetup corrections for HE corner and center references used in a test
- Geometry/MuonCommonData tag V01-08-06 was taken with changes in GEM in v4: Correcting the partitioning og 8-etaPartition GEM chamber
title: Geometry data xml description
